channel.title: AvengedX - 474 Need Development Team - 24/7 Server!
channel.description:
Introduction About us Section 3 Section 4 The Applying Layout Staff list Credit/Section 7
__________________________________________________________________________ __________________________________________________________________________
1.0 - Introduction Hello I am Jordan, owner of AvengedX, I'm currently looking for a development team for my rsps it is quickly growing come join me!
__________________________________________________________________________
2.0 - About us I started coding servers about 2 years ago, but left my project unfinished because of no money for a vps, I finally decided to buy a vps and here I am. :)
__________________________________________________________________________
3.0 - Section 3 My goal is to make one of the best rsps's out there. I need help though. It's a hard one man job! __________________________________________________________________________
4.0 - Section 4 We will use teamviewer for this project, I need to get a webclient done also, I have made webclients in the past but I'm having trouble with this one. __________________________________________________________________________
5.0 - Apply
In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address?: What position do you want? (Entertainer, Coder, Suggester, Tester): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?: //*****Other Info Below Here*****\\ __________________________________________________________________________
6.0 - Staff List
Coders:
1/5 Jordan
Suggestors: 2/2 Wise Itz Rylee
Testers:
0/5
Client Coders:
0/1
Forum Coders:
0/2
_____________________________________________________________

item.title: AvengedX - 474 Need Development Team - 24/7 Server!

item.description:
@We_Came_as_Romans wrote:

Introduction
About us
Section 3
Section 4
The Applying Layout
Staff list
Credit/Section 7

1.0 - Introduction
Hello I am Jordan, owner of AvengedX, I’m currently looking for a development team for my rsps it is quickly growing come join me!

2.0 - About us
I started coding servers about 2 years ago, but left my project unfinished because of no money for a vps, I finally decided to buy a vps and here I am.

3.0 - Section 3
My goal is to make one of the best rsps’s out there. I need help though. It’s a hard one man job!

4.0 - Section 4
We will use teamviewer for this project, I need to get a webclient done also, I have made webclients in the past but I’m having trouble with this one.

5.0 - Apply
